接口 SysMessageDao

  • 所有已知实现类:
    SysMessageDaoImpl

    public interface SysMessageDao
    The DAO layer for sysmessage

    • 方法详细资料

      • addSysMessage

        boolean addSysMessage(SysMessage sysMessage)
        To add a system message into the database.
        参数:
        sysMessage - The sysMessage object
        返回:
        If success, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

      • getMyMessage

        java.util.List<SysMessage> getMyMessage(int myUid)
        Get all the system messages a user has received
        参数:
        myUid - uid of the user
        返回:
        List of message

      • getMessage

        SysMessage getMessage(int messageID)
        Get a message object entity according to the messageID
        参数:
        messageID - messageID
        返回:
        Sysmessage object entity

      • deleteMessage

        boolean deleteMessage(int messageID)
        To delete a message from database
        参数:
        messageID - messageID
        返回:
        If success, returns true. Otherwise, false.
